message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $180. I think it's a great value and I'm confident you'll love it!
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to make a serious offer, and I think it's a price that works for both of us.
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $140. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $140. I'm willing to meet you at $130, and I think it's a fair price for both of us.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $130. However, I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer, and I'll meet you at $135. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
